partner.name: Partner
partner.description: {x} and I fought alongside each other to defend a clearing from a faction’s advances...but we failed. Why did we defend the clearing? Why did we fail? Who defeated us?
partner.benefit: When you fill in this connection, you each mark 2-prestige with the faction you helped, and mark 2-notoriety with the faction you harmed. During play, if you are spotted together, then any prestige or notoriety gains with those factions are doubled for the two of you.

friend.name: Friend
friend.description: I traveled with {x} for a time right after I became a vagabond. They helped keep me safe and showed me the Woodland. What keepsake did I gift them?
friend.benefit: When you help them, you can mark 2-exhaustion to give a +2, instead of 1-exhaustion for a +1.

protector.name: Protector
protector.description: I once protected {x} from a mortal blow during a fight, and I would do it again. Why?
protector.benefit: When they are in reach, mark exhaustion to take a blow meant for them. If you do, take +1 ongoing to weapon moves for the rest of the scene.

professional.name: Professional
professional.description: {x} and I tried to blaze a new trail between two clearings; without the support of the major factions, it never fully came to fruition.
professional.benefit: If you share information with them after reading a tense situation, you both benefit from the +1 for acting on the answers. If you help them while they attempt a roguish feat, you gain choices on the help move as if you had marked 2-exhaustion when you mark 1-exhaustion.

watcher.name: Watcher
watcher.description: I was tricked, conned, or deceived by {x} once. Why do I choose to continue working with them?
watcher.benefit: When you figure them out, you always hold 1, even on a miss. When you plead with them to go along with you, you can let them clear 2-exhaustion instead of 1.

family.name: Family
family.description: {x} and I had each other’s back when we were run out of a clearing because our natures got out of hand.
family.benefit: When you help them fulfill their nature, you both clear your exhaustion track.
